Name: Base Station License, Approval, Accord Car & Limo, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Accord Car & Limo Service, Inc., also known as Accord Car & Limo Svc., Inc., also known as Accord Car & Limousine Service Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Accord Car & Limo Service, Inc., also known as Accord Car & Limo Svc., Inc., also known as Accord Car & Limousine Service Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 36-26 Greenpoint Avenue in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#2681
